 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֵ֑דֶק‎</span> **noun [masculine]** ==brier== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎חִדְקָא‎</span> [[BDB#Löw|Löw]]<sup>p. 147, No. 104</sup>; compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> a kind of night-shade, see [[BDB#Lane|Lane]]<sup>532</sup>); — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎טוֺבָם כַּחֵדֶק‎</span> [[Mic.7.4|Mic 7:4]] ***the best of them*** (si vera lectio) ***is like the brier*** (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָשָׁר מִמְּסוּכָה‎</span>); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דֶּרֶךְ עָצֵל כִּמְשֻׂכַת חָ֑דֶק‎</span> [[Prov.15.19|Prov 15:19]] ***the way of a sluggard is like a brier-hedge.***
